Package com.tyrlib2.graphics.animation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    This class represents an animation by manipulating a skeleton.
    AnimationFrame
    This class represents a single animation frame
    Bone
    Represents a single joint of a skeleton.
    Skeleton
    This class manages skeletal animations by using bones.
